website_summaries.verdict: Though it takes a little elbow grease to remove it, this top-selling car wax has been a favorite among car lovers for generations. Its reputation for being a dependable, affordable product continues today.
pros: A popular car wax that's safe for most car finishes
Produces reasonable shine and beading that lasts
Comes at a fraction of the price of other options we considered
cons: A bit difficult to buff, especially when applied in a thick film
Shine isn't quite as high-gloss as that produced by higher-priced, premium brands

customer_reviews.title: I do not think this would give you an easy workaround.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was my fault to keep it to condition for 10-15 minutes or the product but it got harder on my car's body and way too hard to remove the wax; i felt like i was rubbing the paint off with the microfiber.
customer_reviews.author: Saad A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. Once applied and polished it becomes really hard and holds long enough. It has been 3 months since i coated my car and i still notice water repelling effect, which implies that wax is still there. Be sure to mask unpainted plastic parts before applying as it will not dissolve quickly and there will be white residue all over.
customer_reviews.author: Igoris C.

customer_reviews.title: Car looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Waxing turned out great. It took me about 45 minutes to wax my entire car after washing. I estimate that this container has enough wax for at least 8 uses
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Still the best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Just applied to my new 2017 Jeep Wrangler. Took about an hour and it wipes on and off very smooth. In the beginning I put it on heavy but gradually decreased the amount. I would recommend doing in stages instead of applying all at once(a little goes a long way). I will update to see how it holds up in there rest of the winter! Can't beat it for $4!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks/feels good
customer_reviews.text: Great wax. Goes on and off easy and instantly helped with dirt buildup and water beading, just as a wax should. This is the first wax I have personally used on my car and and I am very happy with it. On a 97 Ford Ranger, I used maybe an 1/8 of the container. Good amount of it and so far working well.
customer_reviews.author: Sacmaster

customer_reviews.title: the old-fashioned way is better
customer_reviews.text: This is the old-fashioned way of polishing your car, and I'm happy to have found it on Amazon. Just like the turtle wax that I have used, off and on, for decades. It's the best way to protect you car's finish and make it shine. We also use it on other things, like the washer/drier out in the garage. It protects the finish from rust.
customer_reviews.author: survivor '07

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WAX!
customer_reviews.text: This wax works excellent! I applied it to my car surface after a good wash and the surface looks amazing! It shines and the wax stays on the surface. Comes off relatively easy with a microfiber towel after applying. I used it on different color cars from light to dark. Would recommend for all car types and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Not a good wax
customer_reviews.text: Honestly didn’t see a difference on my car. It was so hard to take off as well. I put it all over my car after a car wash and I had to go wash my car again to take off. That’s how hard it was to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Martha CRUZ

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: used it for the firstr time on my car and gave it a good sheen
customer_reviews.author: glengoffe

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Wax T-222R Super Hard Shell Paste Wax
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wax for cars and bikes. After wash and polish, I seal everything with Turtle Paste Wax. Easy apply, let dry to haze, and buff with micro cloth. Gorgeous shine.
customer_reviews.author: John M Lapoint

customer_reviews.title: It's Magic
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders. This makes my car super smooth and shiny. I prefer to wash, dry, clay bar the surface, and then wax it. I'm just loving my car as a new hobby. After washing and drying, apply the turtle wax with the application with a little moisture so that it won't be too dry and messy. Make sure it's not in direct sunlight. I usually do this a little after the sun sets around 4pm-5pm. Don't do circles when applying, apply with straight lines as best as you can, or you'll have those unsightly circular patterns. Yup, great product with great end results. Thanks. -Tiger
customer_reviews.author: Teason

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Best shine for the money AFAIK. Don't let it dry too long, though, or it gets tough to buff.
customer_reviews.author: Albert I.

customer_reviews.title: Still the Best.
customer_reviews.text: I use TW Paste all year round in multiple layers to protect my vintage darling's face from AZ's punishing sun and heat. 15 years ago repaint job still shining like new. 8)
customer_reviews.author: WineCountryLover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely put a shine on my 24 year old outboard motor!
customer_reviews.author: John Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a finish coat on my motorcycle ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a finish coat on my motorcycle. It's cheap. It works. It gives a decent shine and keeps a lot of the road grime off the bike making it easier to wash next time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hamrick

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: Love this wax been using it for years works great on my 2008 silverado will order again you wont be sorry you ordered this product.
customer_reviews.author: RONG

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good wax. Works great. Comes with polishing pad inside the lid. Yet another item bought through Amazon, sold by amazon, yet it still isn't a verified purchase!?!?
customer_reviews.author: SW2

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Paste Wax ...is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.text: Best way to extend the life of your car's finish is to use theT-222R formula of Turtle wax. It works so well that I am about to put it on my painted garden table and chairs, to keep this furniture looking good, and easier to clean!
customer_reviews.author: SwedeDC

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Anything placed on hood after wax set ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a car helping a young adult out who just got a vehicle. Good product. Anything placed on hood after wax set slid right off, good protection and makes for a few comical moments for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: tigerina

customer_reviews.title: BUY IN STORES!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it's amazing. But you can get it for like $4 at Walmart
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: provides acceptable protection for car finish
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay wax for protecting your car's finish. Lasts well. For the money, it's a pretty good deal. Comes with an applicator that lasts pretty well, if you make sure and keep it rinsed out during the application process. Shines up pretty well after application.
customer_reviews.author: snazzmo

customer_reviews.title: It's wax
customer_reviews.text: It's good wax and yes it takes time and a little sweat. Always happy with the old standard.
customer_reviews.author: S. Matson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this product for the price. Been using it for years. You can pay more but you won't get better results. Recommend waxing in stages so wax won't dry too hard which makes it more difficult to remove. .
customer_reviews.author: scott ford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this frequently to help keep rust from reappearing on almost anything (after properly removing any initial rust).
customer_reviews.author: Jon A.

customer_reviews.title: Wax on, wax off.
customer_reviews.text: Turtle Wax. Its what you would expect. I received as an add-on item, but I noticed it at Wally-World on the shelf for roughly the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to apply with just a damp applicator and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a little more expensive on Amazon. However, it's easy to apply with just a damp applicator and it lasted me all summer without a recoat.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Turtle Was has always been one of my favorites. It does a good job of protecting my vehicle finish.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: gotta make sure it dries before you wipe it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerR Miles

customer_reviews.title: ... coat stainless steel kitchen appliances that show fingerprints too easily. It works pretty well and is fairly easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this to coat stainless steel kitchen appliances that show fingerprints too easily. It works pretty well and is fairly easy to apply and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: threej

customer_reviews.title: Leader in exterior car care
customer_reviews.text: Legendary product. A must have to hide scratches and shine up your auto paint
customer_reviews.author: A Philson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, lasts long and repels dirt and water really nice
customer_reviews.author: E. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Should be packaged better for shipment
customer_reviews.text: Second order arrived cracked again... Using duck tape to hold lid together.
customer_reviews.author: Terri M

customer_reviews.title: Always been my go to wax
customer_reviews.text: Always been my go to wax. Not sure it lasts a year though. One can covers my 2 large SUVs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Don

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Turned my 1998 Toyota 4runner to like new. I got compliment from my family.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Tran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: used on shower walls to help with soap scum. beads well
customer_reviews.author: virginia lamy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives the car a nice shine. Easy to apply. Does attract dust though.
customer_reviews.author: chlub

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: Makes my truck look like it is new! The only problem I had is the black plastic trim on my truck around the wheel wells and around the tail gays and this is so hard to get off of those so be careful!!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It's a good, affordable paste wax (though it's not as "paste-y" ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this on the cast iron tools in my shop. It's a good, affordable paste wax (though it's not as "paste-y" as I expected).
customer_reviews.author: mzimmers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's just really good car wax, brings back the luster of 21 year old paint on my Z28 Camaro
customer_reviews.author: Hardcore Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like past years, this product does a very good job
customer_reviews.author: TJT

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and good product
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described. Very versatile and not car specific.
customer_reviews.author: rockinshoe

customer_reviews.title: A great basic wax
customer_reviews.text: We all know this product - it did a great job on my boat's hull.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzdawg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got my 2012 Honda Accord looking like new. I've always used Turtle Wax and love it
customer_reviews.author: AdamH

customer_reviews.title: Used it like 3 times.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an older car and it seemed to work pretty well. I haven't waved anything in a while. Maybe when the weather warms up I'll use it again on the new car.
customer_reviews.author: Langevinrox

customer_reviews.title: Very runny
customer_reviews.text: Not what expected. Not the consistency of wax, more like pudding.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G.

customer_reviews.title: Wax it up!
customer_reviews.text: Protect your cast iron table saw top with the best! Easy to apply, makes a smooth surface that resists corrosion.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Brandauer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Just used to wax my car worked wonderfully... Water beads right off
customer_reviews.author: James Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this wax instead of wax like Caranuba wax, it's much easier to apply and to remove.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I've used it for years and had awesome results!
customer_reviews.author: Flea

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting, no. Super Hard shell, not really. If you are going to use this, be sure to only do like 2'x2' sections. It dries very fast even in the shade and is hard to remove after it fully dries. Use a moist applicator, do very small sections and wipe it off within 45 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: CPT_Walt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff i got it on my truck and keeps it shining
customer_reviews.author: Christian M.

customer_reviews.title: he said it worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bald friend, he said it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L Davis

customer_reviews.title: and the nicks had begun to rust horribly. Lots of vinegar later
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to repair several nicks in the satin nickel finishes of a bathroom. Clearly the fixtures aren't actually nickel all the way through, they're plated, and the nicks had begun to rust horribly. Lots of vinegar later, the rust is gone, and an online tutorial told me to buy this wax and use it in the nicks to prevent the rust from coming back. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: H. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good product works well
customer_reviews.text: It is Turtle Wax and name speaks for itself. I put some of this on last summer in late July early August on my autos and the wax is still working on the autos even now in middle of winter, water and ice and snow still bead up. Good smooth finish and shine when done applying this stuff, and it lasts for 6 plus months which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bates

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product for maintaing the originl shine on the car ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product for maintaing the originl shine on the car paint. My car thogh 3 yeard old but looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Menon

customer_reviews.title: Not a good. Product
customer_reviews.text: It left a white powder on my black car, no shine
customer_reviews.author: Faiz Rasool

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for better wax!
customer_reviews.text: Best wax product there is for this price. When using wax i tend to get look for a very good quality, true wax. Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Matas Jankauskas

customer_reviews.title: a very good wax, I think I used it on my ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a wax... Yes, a very good wax, I think I used it on my car, and it definitely held well, kinda like 300 Spartans facing an army of Persians or something
customer_reviews.author: Michael Manolakis

customer_reviews.title: Looks good for how cheap it is
customer_reviews.text: Looks good for how cheap it is. Good value - just try to remove it quick because it dries pretty rough if you try to do the whole car at once.
customer_reviews.author: Kayser

customer_reviews.title: best wax
customer_reviews.text: best was I have ever used. Goes on evenly, dries fast, easy to wipe off. Water beads up well after a rain. Inexpensive
customer_reviews.author: Mary E

customer_reviews.title: i like it ok for the finish
customer_reviews.text: i like it ok for the finish, its like the consistency of french onion dip, i thought it was going to be like mother wax where its solid
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: More than enough for two cars.
customer_reviews.text: The container cracked in shipping, but didn't spill too much, It looks great. One jar is more than enough for two cars.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewName

customer_reviews.title: this is perfect, but if your trying to wax a show ...
customer_reviews.text: Its ok wax. Just ok. If you have a daily driver, this is perfect, but if your trying to wax a show car or higher end car, i wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: henryhere!

customer_reviews.title: Honest product
customer_reviews.text: I am not usually one to leave a review but in this case I feel like it needs to be shared. I ordered this because I saw that it would work on my shower walls. I have VERY hard water and scrubbing down the shower has been the hardest chore up until now. I applied this as directed (a little really goes a long way) and the water just beads right off now. I only see light scrubbing in my future.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Inks

customer_reviews.title: Not brand new
customer_reviews.text: Applicator had wax on it already. Like someone just tested it a bit, returned it and it ended up with me.
customer_reviews.author: spark

customer_reviews.title: Bad Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Not the Turtle wax I remember. Takes forever to wipe off. I let it dry as always but even so it smears something terrible leaving an uneven finish that at times was impossible to remove without re-waxing the area. I spent far more time buffing than waxing, over and over again. I bought it so I guess I'll use it till its gone, but never again. Its back to Meguiar's for me. A lot more expensive with some minor smearing, but nowhere like this 'expletive deleted'.
customer_reviews.author: Philmor

customer_reviews.title: Easy on - work out to take off
customer_reviews.text: I lost 10 pounds of water weight trying to take this stuff off. I think I may have developed tennis elbow too. May need shoulder surgery. Still find areas two weeks later that hadn't come off. I followed some of the warnings from others too. Damp cloth and use very little. Still to no avail. Exhausted and soaking with sweat by the time I finally finished. Looking for an easier solution.
customer_reviews.author: Tom E

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting it off if you get it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Paste is very hard to remove after you've let it dry for the amount of time they say you need to let it dry. Not only is it very difficult to buff out, you will never remove all of it, no matter how hard you try. Good luck getting it off if you get it in small cracks
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: seems to love the sheen and control it gives his comb-over
customer_reviews.text: The Donald, our 56-year-old snapper, seems to love the sheen and control it gives his comb-over. Imagine how shiny The Wall will be!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what you paid for on this one. Cheap price gives you cheap quality. Hard to buff off even after a few seconds of applying it. Glad it was just a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't thick, and didn't last (I used it on my bathroom sink).
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: no mess
customer_reviews.text: really nice feel on the hair, keeps it straight and no mess
customer_reviews.author: Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed, after waxing and buffing for a few hours, the car looked great. After about two months, no more water beading. I will stick to spray wax if this is the alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: Turtle Wax T-222R Super Hard Shell Paste Wax - 14 oz.
product_meta.description: Get Legendary Super Hard Shell protection and shine with Turtle Wax Super Hard Shell Car Wax. The easy on, easy off formula fights harmful UV rays and lasts up to 12 months.
feature_bullets: Legendary Super Hard Shell protection and shine
The leading car wax in the world
Easy on, easy off formula lasts up to 12 months
